channel.title: >>.how to change whip colours!?.<<
channel.description:
Hey guys, how do i add other whip colours on a 317 server ? like:
-Dragon / Red whip -Rune whip -[b]Barrows whip[/b]
If any knows can the say how ? or pm me your msn
thanks,

item.title: >>.how to change whip colours!?.<<
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

it doesn’t work like that…
You need the model.
and you need to recolor and modify the models and add them into the game.

if you don’t know how to model then look for a already done model of the items you need then add them into your client.

Read full topic
